meanings: (목숨을) kill, take sb's life, (살해하다) murder, (informal) knock sb off, (신문·문학 용어) slay, (학살하다) slaughter, butcher, ...
Verb bring down, make something blunt
(속담) A little knowledge is a dangerous thing.
A blind trust can kill[catch] a person
A novice shaman catches[kills] a person, A little knowledge is a dangrous thing

vlive.korean: 러브들이랑 배그하면 아무도 저 안 죽인다라고... "If you play Battlegrounds with L.O.Λ.Es, nobody will try to kill you". 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST] 쩨-하🤗
vlive.english: "If you play Battlegrounds with L.O.Λ.Es, nobody will try to kill you".

vlive.korean: 야 오늘 날씨 죽인다~ - 네. Wow, today's weather is awesome. - Yes, it is. 듣기 View video 포토피플(PHOTO PEOPLE) : Ep.01 무엘이의 포토피플 적응기
vlive.english: Wow, today's weather is awesome. - Yes, it is.

examples.korean: Some drugs kill off useful bacteria in the user’s body. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 일부 약물은 복용자 체내의 유익한 박테리아를 대대적으로 죽인다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
